titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on threaded stoppers, caps, and lids of base metal with chromium or gold-plated finish, of a type and size suitable for use on salt-and-pepper shakers, perfume bottles, and the like.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/30/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on threaded stoppers, caps, and lids of base metal with chromium or gold-plated finish, of a type and size suitable for use on salt-and-pepper shakers, perfume bottles, and the like.
